title: Russia and the stock market: ‘Fate of tech’ far outweighs Moscow when it comes to S&P 500, says BofA - MarketWatch
content: Russia and the stock market: ‘Fate of tech’ far outweighs Moscow when it comes to S&P 500, says BofA  MarketWatch
description: Investors have been anxious over geopolitical tensions tied to Russia, but the S&P 500 index has minuscule exposure to the country while technology continues...
